metadata.name: Windows Defender Exclusions Added - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -exclusionpath ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -exclusionextension ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -exclusionprocess ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -exclusionipaddress '))) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-mppreference ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-mppreference '))))

output.summary: Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions
